name: clinker production | waste foundry sand | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21096/documentation

The dataset describes the production of portland cement clinker; in the production different types of alternative fuels and raw materials are used. As the use of a alternative fuel/material can vary considerably between different years.;This dataset was created as a weighted average (by production volumes) of the regional clinker production activities.

From the reception of traditional and alternative fuels and raw materials at the factory gate.

This activity ends with the cooling of the produced clinker. It includes the whole manufacturing process to produce clinker (raw material provision, grinding and mixing; rotary kiln process), internal processes (transport, etc.) and for the infrastructure only the rotary kiln (material consumption) is taken into account. No administration is included. Waste (as secondary fuel and raw material) enter the system without environmental burdens from upstream processes.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: This activity was updated for the ecoinvent v3.6. database as a weighted average (by production volume) of all the available regional activities.

exchanges.description: Calculated as a weighted average (by production volume) of the regional activities.
